mapper.select: SELECT good.id, good.category_id, good.good_name, good.description, good.promotion, good.price, good.sale_volume, good.discount, good.on_sale, good.hot, good.is_new, good.create_date, good.last_update_date, good.freight, good.brand_id, good.seller_id, good.visit_total, good.good_no, good.main_image_url, good.status, good.stock, good.seo, good.rich_content, tacg.id, tacg.activity_id, tacg.good_id, tacg.create_date, tacg.stock AS activity_stock, tacg.status FROM t_good good LEFT JOIN t_activity_good tacg ON good.id=tacg.good_id WHERE good.id=#{goodId} AND good.status='NORMAL' AND good.on_sale='ON_SALE' AND good.audit='PASS_AUDIT' GROUP BY good.id
mapper.update: UPDATE t_good SET stock=(stock - #{stock}) WHERE id=#{goodId}
UPDATE t_activity_good SET stock=(stock- #{count}) WHERE id=#{id}
UPDATE t_good SET sale_volume=(sale_volume + #{saleVolume}) WHERE id=#{goodId}
UPDATE t_good SET visit_total=visit_total + 1 WHERE id=#{goodId}
mapper.select: SELECT tgs.good_name, tgs.price, tgs.main_image_url FROM t_good_snapshot tgs LEFT JOIN t_order ord ON tgs.id=ord.good_snapshot_id WHERE ord.id=#{orderId}
SELECT id, user_id, good_id, message, nick_name, create_date, update_date FROM t_estimate WHERE good_id=#{goodId}
